name: Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Nepean

reviews.text: We are from Orleans...and were travelling west on Friday to visit family in North Bay. Due to the extreme road conditions we were unable to drive to North Bay and did not want to return home.
reviews.title: Unexpected Stay - Very pleasant stay

reviews.text: We booked a last minute stay at the hotel.
reviews.title: Great new location!

reviews.text: Check in was smooth...the room was clean and spacious. The kids loved the pool....
reviews.title: Lovely and Friendly

reviews.text: In the morning we had an excellent breakfast, another quick swim and then made our way to North Bay.
reviews.title: Hotel is very good!

reviews.text: Highly recommend this hotel!
reviews.title: Would stay again

reviews.text: Some think that chain hotels, such as the Holiday Inn, tend all to be the same. This property is about two years old and you can certainly tell that you are in a new and modern facility. A convenient location for the west-end of Ottawa, and close to a restaurants. Want a great SPA experience? The Spa on Robertson is about a 4 minute walk from the hotel. Staff friendly and well maintained gym and pool area. Much better value than staying at the more expensive Kanata Holiday Inn.
reviews.title: A nicely managed property

reviews.text: We stayed there during the month of June last year and really enjoyed it !
reviews.title: More than what we've expected !

reviews.text: The staff at checkin was very professionnal. The hotel smells fresh and clean, same thing for the rooms, they are spacious and beds comfortable.
reviews.title: Nothing Special

reviews.text: Everytime we would call the front desk to request something they we're always able to help us. I mean I work at a holiday inn and the service was beyond expectations. Had book two rooms and requested a king size bed and the other room with two double beds, and my request was honored, had both rooms facing each other on the 5th floor as I remember, and the view was nice when looking out the window.
reviews.title: Great Basic Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As a pc member received my express check out under the door :) The breakfast was just good we also liked enjoying the pool until 11pm. I promise to return there if employee rate is available pretty soon ! Thanks to the staff who made it memorable and relaxing to us STAY REAL !
reviews.title: Really enjoyed it

reviews.text: We didn't want to be right in Ottawa so we found this Holiday Inn just outside and it was the best decision. It was clean and the service was fabulous and friendly. They have a complimentary breakfast that has just enough to be able to grab a quick bite. We stayed 2 nights and we will be staying there again on our next Ottawa trip.
reviews.title: Great Location Just Outside Ottawa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here last weekend, as we were in town for the hockey game. For us, it was a very good location, because it was about 15 minutes to downtown Ottawa, it was about 10 minutes to the arena, and there was plenty of food options nearby, so I am glad we chose this location.
reviews.title: Good location for us

reviews.text: Overall, the hotel was nice. It was clean and well-maintained, and the staff were professional, as expected. We were upgraded to a bigger suite, and we got the rooms we requested, so that was appreciated. We didn't use the pool because we forgot to pack swimsuits, but it was never crowded, and it looked okay (not too big though).
reviews.title: Friendly service, clean and comfortable

reviews.text: The breakfast was just okay. I have stayed in another Holiday Inn where they have a chef on site cooking omlettes, so I always compare continental breakfasts to this, and it never compares. I had heard that Holiday Inns were famous for their cinnamon buns, but on the first day (a Sunday), they were nothing at all to get excited about and we were disappointed. They were tiny, with no icing .... but during the mid week, they were nicer, with some icing, but still nothing to get excited about.
reviews.title: Better than expectec

reviews.text: One other minor detail was that we were supposed to have a newspaper delivered to our room daily and that only happened once, and we didn't receive our check-out info under the door like you usually do so we had to go to the desk to check out ... but that wasn't really a big deal.
reviews.title: Cozy Clean & Fun

reviews.text: the rooms were clean. fast and easy to get too lots of parking quiet without hockey teams. we stayed 3 in a room big and spacious, needed a little bit more tawols. we asked and recieved. hot tub was a little dirty but it wasen't too bad. reasonable price. :) over all great stay. gps has hard time finding it because of the new address.
reviews.title: great stay!
Solid hotel
reviews.text: A little bit off the motorway, nice hotel for business or family travel. Have stayed here many nights for business, the staff is friendly, the rooms are clean and safe. Wifi works good, breakfast bar is the standard Holiday Inn Express fare. Bottom line, a nice, quiet place to rest.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This place was easy to find and had lots of parking. However after finding out we booked through Hotwire.com, we felt like we were treated differently. We arrived in our room to find the bill for the previous occupant still in the room which we pretty much ignored and settled in. When we had issues with our toilet, we made a call to the front desk. They informed us the staff had left for the evening and we were welcome to come get the plunger and fix the problem ourselves. When we inquired about this in the morning, we were told they could not help us out due to our booking with Hotwire and if we had complains, we should take it to them. We were not impressed.
reviews.title: Room not to our standard

reviews.text: Enjoyed the stay at this location and will return next year. Great place to save $$$ when vacationing in the Ottawa area. 15 Min drive to the downtown core where hotels are $200 including parking. If you’re looking for a great place to eat try a cozy up-scale restaurant next door in the mini mall. It's only a two minute walk and serves delicious food. It's called Cyranos. Staff here at the hotel recommended it and it also has great internet reviews.
reviews.title: NICE PLACE

reviews.text: Recently spent 4 nights with our hockey team. Nice rooms, clean hotel, friendly staff. The pool is something that bothers me. The chlorine level was so high that the kids eyes were swollen and red, some of the kids had red rashes all over their body. It's apparently a salt water pool that is ruined with using way too much extra chlorine. Therefore after the first bd experience with the pool my kids were unable to swim. The breakfast is okay, needs a pancake maker, hard boiled eggs and fruit. Each day we had to request additional towels as they only left 3 when there were 4 per room. I have stayed at this hotel in the past and will again,a however I would not advise using the pool or hot tub. The hot tub had so many a bubbles and didn't look we'll maintained.
reviews.title: Overall good stay

aka: Holiday Inn Express Hotel And Suites Nepean
description: Our rates include FREE ‘Smart Start Breakfast Bar’ including Hot & Cold items, served in the Great Room off the Lobby. Included in the rate is FREE Wireless Internet Access throughout the Hotel, as well as ample FREE Parking. Our well-appointed Guest Rooms are spacious and luxurious, featuring beds with the ‘SimplySmart® Bedding Collection*, 37” LCD Flat Screen TV`s, Coffee Machines, and our beautiful SimplySmart® Guest Bathrooms*. The HOLIDAY INN EXPRESS & SUITES – OTTAWA WEST NEPEAN also offers:- Indoor Heated Salt Water Pool and Whirlpool - State-of-the-art Fitness Facility- Business Centre with Free Internet Access- Meeting and Conference Rooms to accommodate up to 100 people.- Great Room available 24 Hours a day, offering Coffee & Tea.
